授業目的: The purpose of this Research Seminar is for students to conduct research and write a graduation thesis on themes of their own choices.
到達目標:
Taking this course students will:
◦ acquire knowledge and skills to conduct independent research.
◦ develop academic writing, presentation, discussion skills, and communicate their research results to wider society.
◦ complete their research works and write the graduation thesis.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: This research seminar explores contemporary globalization and development issues aiming to enhance students’ research skills. Through group and individual guidance and consultation with the faculty, the students will carry out research on their interested research theme, and develop a research proposal at the end of the first year (Research Seminar I). In the second year (Research Seminar II), students will draft, revise, and finalize their graduation thesis.
授業方法: この科目は教室で対面で実施します。This course is conducted face-to-face in the class. For those who applied to take courses on-line, I will conduct real-time Zoom sessions during course hours.

トピック.授業計画1:
All sessions of both semesters will be conducted face to face in the class.
Spring semester:
1-2 Orientation on the ingredients of the graduation thesis.
3-10 Work on graduation thesis: Literature review (writing and presentations).
11-14 Work on graduation thesis: Research methodology (writing and presentations).

Fall semester:
1-5 Data collection, data analysis, presentation, and discussion among students and the instructor..
5-10 Turning out the draft of the complete thesis and presentations.
11-14 Final presentation, revision, and submission of the final thesis.
トピック.授業外学習2: Courses related to Economics, Develpomet, Globalization and International Relations.
